name: Law Firm
key_questions: What are your primary practice areas?
How many active client matters do you handle?
Do you encrypt client communications and documents?
Have you experienced any security incidents?
Do you have cyber liability coverage through your bar association?

outreach_templates.subject_line: Law Firms Are Prime Targets for Cybercriminals - Protect Client Trust
outreach_templates.opening: Your clients trust you with their most sensitive information. A data breach can destroy that trust and your reputation overnight.
pain_points: Client data breaches exposing privileged information
Wire transfer fraud targeting real estate closings
State bar ethics complaints from security failures
outreach_templates.cta: Get a law firm-specific cyber risk assessment

discovery_script_focus: Practice areas and client data sensitivity
compliance_considerations: State bar ethics opinions on cybersecurity
